title: Legal Entity Official Organizational Role vLEI Credential
description: A vLEI Role Credential issued by a Qualified vLEI issuer to official representatives of a Legal Entity

personLegalName.description: Recipient name as provided during identity assurance

officialRoleLongName.description: Official role long name i.e. 'Head of Standards'

officialRoleAbbreviation.description: Official role abbreviation from ISO 5009 Official Organization Role list, if available

officialRoleCode.description: Official role code from ISO 5009 Official Organization Role list

auth.description: Chain to Auth vLEI credential from legal entity

n.description: SAID of the ACDC to which the edge connects

oneOf.description: SAID of required 1.0.0 schema of the credential pointed to by this node
SAID of required 1.1.0 schema of the credential pointed to by this node

o.description: Operator indicating this node is the issuer

l.const: Usage of a valid, unexpired, and non-revoked vLEI Credential, as defined in the associated Ecosystem Governance Framework, does not assert that the Legal Entity is trustworthy, honest, reputable in its business dealings, safe to do business with, or compliant with any laws or that an implied or expressly intended purpose will be fulfilled.

All information in a valid, unexpired, and non-revoked vLEI Credential, as defined in the associated Ecosystem Governance Framework, is accurate as of the date the validation process was complete. The vLEI Credential has been issued to the legal entity or person named in the vLEI Credential as the subject; and the qualified vLEI Issuer exercised reasonable care to perform the validation process set forth in the vLEI Ecosystem Governance Framework.
